content: So far so good. I just don't like having to disarm it just to get up at night to go to the bathroom. Then to only re-arm it. I haven't been setting it at night for this reason due to getting up alot lattely. Is there a way to just dis-arm the motion sensor until i know i'm finally snuggled in till dawn?
The app won't arm at all. I don't know what's going on. This needs fixed asap.
camera keeps disconnecting p
Slow to load doorbell camera, stopped recording and saving videos. Generally flakey.
Working great so much easier to control functions from phone! 😎👍👍
SVR Function never works which is pointless

The doorbell camera does not work or load properly if someone rings the doorbell the app doesn't load until the person has walked away. Now it tells me try troubleshooting, have done it multiple times. Uninstalled the app/reconnect still won't load. Troubleshooted with rep multiple times, each time it will work for about 30 days and right back to saying trouble shoot. If this can't be fixed correctly I will discontinue the doorbell service and choose another vendor
Cameras and doorbell always fail when trying to view them. App always has issues loading.
I have gaurdian security how does this app work ? do I need to pay extra for this app ? this app does not let me create an acct
I received my Guardian Torch camera and when I go to this app it ask me to scan the OR but I have no clue as to where it is ?
Issues keep recurring. Even after reinstall.

I have guardian equipment in my home and when I cancelled Guardian monitoring, the app doesn't work!!!!! Meaning you cannot activate alarm or see if it's going off unless you pay for service. Stinks!!! So they want approx $40 per month ($480 per year) to reactivate services/app when Ring charges $100 for entire year for live monitoring. I have Ring at second home, and it works great. And if I didn't want monitoring from Ring, I can still use app. Guardian products way overpriced if broken!!!

Never had to access the app to view my video clips. For about two weeks now everytime I click on the widget it takes me to the login page and not the video view. I use to be able to just tap my screen for the house views but that is totally messed up and are not working. May have something to do with the last update for the Galaxy widgets Also, Guardian charges you everytime they have to come fix something NEVER falls under maintence repair ( no charge ). So I get notifications, but cant view.

Love the peace of mind that I get knowing my family is protected from theft, fire and carbon monoxide. Also added front and rear outside cameras. Salesman was wonderful, gave his sales pitch and price and let me make up my mind. The competitor used the high pressure MUST sign now or price doubles tomorrow deal.
Great service
Nice
In my opinion is that guardian alarm system is the best in protecting your family and your home. Give them a call you will be surprised. Compared for what is outhere. GUARDIAN PROTECTION!!!
Cant trouble shoot
Call Help desk and they were great, Thank You
Luis!!
Really good
App works grear but I cannot get my doorbell to chime through my phone. When I first got it, my door bell chimed and now the text message sound overrides anything else.
Since we have upgraded our service has still been excellent we just have extra options
Awful. Would give - stars if I could
Excellent
I'm blown away with the simplicity and power in my hands to control so much in my new home. I feel like Tony Stark.
Good app to keep my family safe.

Every time I try and look at the camera after the system notify me that someone entered the house through the front door, basement door , and garage occasionally their is not video to view of that happening. Can anyone help in this situation??
Convenient very helpful. Can arm and disarm anywhere with my phone or iPad. Like it a lot.
This app is a bomb I enjoyed it it helps me out all around the home thank you

No issues with app whatsoever. Those with issues pertaining to their cameras need to take into consideration the amount of bandwidth being used up by everyone being home. This isn't just a reflection of your home network, but the ISP in your area being overwhelmed by ALL those staying home. To avoid interruptions in video call your ISP and upgrade your internet tier. You can also help yourselves out my making sure they have the latest and greatest in tech in terms of the router they installed
I get a million alerts to wind but nothing functional to people. Now the garage says closed when it's open. Trying a uninstall/reinstall.
Weather alarms drive me crazy, and i live inland North Carolina! Worst we get is a bunch of rain!

I cannot view the live service on my skybell camera. I get a picture that looks like multi-colored Christmas lights. Therefore, I cannot identify when someone is at the door. Only a figure in multi-colored lights. Everything else works.
Great app, keeps my wife safe from her piece of trash ex.
Very good
I'm trying to download for 2 days, won't complete for download
Their equipment doesn't work. Will never recommend this company to anyone. I'm paying for a service that doesn't work. Never again.
Great App! Easy to use. Way better than ADT.
Great
User friendly !.

When I first started out with guardian it was great however my video doesn't work anymore. I called technical support it only worked that night and after that it no longer works. I'm seeing feed back from guardian in other response being home and high usage doesn't have anything to do with it. I didn't work at home and my son was at school and I still had this problem. It need to be corrected
Used to work well but the last few weeks the camera on the doorbell is malfunctioning. It won't even record a video when you press the doorbell and won't pick up any motion.
Does not delete video clips when you try to delete individual dates. Overall pretty fair not definitely needs some improvement
great
Downloaded app to phone. Can view status but can't take an action. Version on my IPad works well, but don't carry it with me.
Great service, app works perfectly as described 😊 very satisfied, it's been 5 years since we meet and going for more year to come!
Bad experience with this company I have to find a better service always on time to take money from my account but never interested in giving good service
GR8

I love being able to arm/disarm remotely; it's so convenient! I also love having the ability to check our videos, "answer" the door remotely when the doorbell is rung, etc. However, it drives me nuts that our doorbell camera records every little thing, and it's on the lowest setting! Its eaten up our video space many times and I'm already over 50% for the month of February. I'd hate for something bad to happen and it not get recorded because our camera decided to record a leaf blowing by.
This company really lied to me, they put me in a contract of 5 years when I just wanted 2 years. I talked to them, manager was so unprofessional, now I'm forced to keep paying.

Garage doors pulse in the app, leaving a false reading as to whether the door is closed or open? Still seeing garage pulse for about 45 seconds and not change immediately on the app. I have called 30 times regarding this matter and it has not been corrected.
Awesome
great

I am also an android user who is having a problem viewing live footage from doorbell. I called guardian who was not helpful. They defered me to skybell company who also were not helpful. Still no resolution! My husband has an iphone and has no problems with it.

I've had to reboot my system several times because the skybell doorbell keeps dropping connection. It's annoying and aggravating makes the doorbell system worthless. UPDATE: It appears that internet provider had a piece of equipment outside my home going bad. They just replaced. We'll see if this cures the problem.

we love Guardian the service is great I think we should have gotten a doorbell camera with what we pay for monitoring but I wasn't thinking about that when the guy came I was so happy to get updated from the old system that we had we should have gotten a little more than we did but the company itself is great just make sure you get everything that you want

Easy to use! Being able to arm and disarm, view our cameras remotely, open and close the garage as well as operate our deadbolts is fantastic! Looking forward to adding thermostat and lighting controls with this as well. Adding or Sonos speakers within the scenes is a nice little touch.
From time to time, the app doesn't record video from thr doorbell anymore. I have to reinstall the app snd reset the doorbell to get it working again.

Unable to arm/disarm, unable to connect to live camera--when door bell is pushed, motion detection is triggered, or when randomly wanting to see live video, and motion detection is triggered when the wind blows. Every error is code 6, yet no explanation is given to resolve the code 6 issue. These issues are not unknown to Guardian, yet they continue.

Doorbell camera goes off constantly even at the lowest setting. Uses up all video space in two days for the month. So useless. Had cars being broke into in neighborhood and couldn't pull up any doorbell video. Had vivient and dident have these issues. But moved to a new house and this is what I get.
This app and this service SUCK!!!!
Its good
Great
Features are nice to have. The videos take quite some time to open. Hoping this can be improved.
Limited controls make this app good for arming, disarming and little else.
Having issue with watching my indoor camera says its disconnected but my wife can see it on her iPhone. Can see every other camera except the indoor.
The ap won't even log me in and launch. It freezes. Used to be great now I can't use it at all. Tried to delete and install again but it doesn't work.
Tends to loose connection quite often
The doorbell camera via the app hasn't saved and recorded any videos since November 11, 2019....so, we're going on 9 days.
The app won't let me open the live doorbell cam, my wife can on her iPhone, but on Android takes forever or doesn't open, very frustrating
Awesome!!!
Easy to use but does not show up when download app.
Been trying to set my alarm on this app and it's suddenly not working.
Easy to use very nice app!
Taking forever to set my alarm through this app. Very frustrating.
Worked fine until its says on top when i open the app says malfunction with device name. Anybody know what that means?
Good job
this alarm system sucks a bag of dicks no reponce rightaway police take 4vever 😢
love this system, great staff and easy to use
Works well
Easy to remotely check parents' alarm system and arm/disarm from the phone if necessary.

you need a way to adjust tamper sensitivity by the user. I have had it raised twice by the security company and still get tamper alarms when inputting password. You also need a way for the user to delete groups of Video Doorbell recordings without deleting individually. I have individually deleted a couple hundred today and have more to do.

The whole sale and system is a nitemare. They stole my money and turned off the service that never worked properly at all from day one. All of this in less than one month and four service calls. They are theives...................................LMAO don't know what to what time it takes for me only to get my text or send him and so and you should be able to have Scott put a few days later that I was ripped out of the there any more than happy with me like this oneday one of my toes shouldn't be.
needs to improve switching between alarm sys at different locations
excellently
great piece of mind, family is secure
The Service has been spot on
downloads ok but cannot appear to send me the setup instructions for my leak detectors.
Absolutely the best smart home security app available!
my app malfunctions with my Samsung phone

App does what it's supposed to, BUT. The latest update ruined the widgets for Galaxy. Used to be able to tap any one of my scenes for my house (Disarm, Arm (Delay), Arm (No Delay), etc.) from a widget placed on my home screen. Never had to access the app. Now the widgets don't work after Version 4.10.3. Other then that, app works like it should.
there should be a panick button on the app too.
This app literally never works. It is 100% broken garbage. It consistently pretends to log me in for years and then crashes. It cannot actually be used. I'm switching to Ring.

I got a reply on my system not being able to arm with not entry delay which is why it is greyed out. Your reply is not accurate because I can do it from the panel just not the app. The option is on the bottom of the panel when you push arm all and it does work if you push the entry delay button to off.  Since the panel can do it I don't understand why I can not do it in the app.
I am trying t viewcoutside my home.
Highly meets all if my needs and I couldn't be more pleased with the services provided along with excellent customer service.
this app is awesome
it's unreliable. sometimes you can do everything from your phone and other times you cannot do anything
love Guardian and Love the App
Very easy to use. I love having control of the alarm system on my phone. It really does work from anywhere.
m my Ehey Guardian I need to change 94308177
dont work half the time
great setup

This app could be great with a few modifications. I continually have issues with viewing my cameras. Sometimes it works good and most days there are issues, cameras are offline, buffering constantly, unable to view, etc. Please Fix these issues.
My VPN is blocking this apo since last update. Only one of over a hundred other apps i have installed.

This app doesn't automatically open and allow you to immediately see when someone rings the doorbell. if the person ringing the bell doesn't wait, you will miss them. I am definitely going with another carrier as soon as my contract is up.
Widgets to arm/disarm no longer work, unless recently logged into the app. Which beats the whole purpose of the widgets. Issue on Oneplus 6T running Android Pie.
Google assistant support is lacking, otherwise this does everything I need without complaint.
Just updated and now arming and disarming no longer work. Just sits there "arming" then gives up with no notice or error. Useless now.
Not bad. Only real complaint is that I wish billing was built into it.
App only works 5% of the time. Always just cycling and NEVER sets the alarm or lock the doors. Always have to manually arm or disarm the system!!!

I was told that the system records clips whenever someone is in the area that was selected on my monitor. Unfortunately this system will not allow you to go backwards to see what triggered the alarm . It Do Not record 24 hours as I asked when getting this system be abuse I travel out of town often. This is not a good security system. Look around for another security system if you're interested in one. The salesman who sold me this garbage is Kenneth Scurry. I called and texted him regarding
Constantly have issues with the app! Layout needs to change...I always hit the Panic button by accident through the app on my phone. Its right in that spot while scrolling thru
the app is not compatible with google home etc. consider making this update
This update quit working correctly after updates...please fix the garage door opener portion soon.
Constant samsumg phone error that shows even after correcting emailed never got a response poor customer service still having issues poor application
its doesn't even work. I'm really regretting that I signed with this company.

App does not work like it should, app claims it is not connected with phones on account even though I can use some of the app with the alarm system, app claims there are problems but doesn't allow you to fix those problems within the app, customer service's only suggested was reinstalling app and that has not helped
Awesome
wont let me login, not receiving the emails it says it is sending
This app sucks.

Removed the ability to open/close garage without going to an additional window. Meanwhile, arming/disarming alarm can be done without going to an additional window. Restore ability to open/close garage without transferring windows.
I sur hope this works.

Update on 12/9/2018: lowered to 3 stars. App widgets no longer work with Samsung s9+. By no longer work I mean it works 10% of they time. One widget seems to always fail. It has a scene with 5 commands. Update on 10/5/2017: I do like this app still but I wish the widgets would notify me that they ran successfully. When I run a widget to set the alarm from work or the store (bc I forgot to set it when I left), I find myself double checking in the main app. Defeats the purpose of having the widget. Original: I use GE zwave plus switches with this app. Works great. Small delay sometimes up to 5-10 seconds but normally around 2-3 seconds. I'd imagine that is more the devices and distance more than the app itself. Overall I'm really satisfied and my wife loves just pressing the movie scene from the couch. App has widgets for Android OS that allows me to run scenes right off the home screen. I have 6 devices currently and I might get more but just did the essentials for now bc it's cost $$$$. Can't wait until these switches are just the norm.
constantly have to reset the camera, and recieve multiple notifications without being able to see anything because camera will not stream. very very annoying and as of now not useful to me.
90% of time app will not let me set alarm or disalarm. I have uninstalled several times for at least a full day, it will work good then it stops.
Doesn't tell u anything wish I never got it
Notifications take 20 mins to an hour to com through hope no one ever breaks in my house I will not no for an hour

Love Guardian and the app. I understand that if I change anything in my house (wifi password, router, move furniture, etc.) that it could affect things, but as long as I have a few minutes to spare, customer service is always able to help.
Glitch in time. I get notification minutes after the doorbell has been pressed so I am unable to communicate real time.
Does not connect to the keypad on the door. Customer service is awful. Never able to help
I. Like Guardian service
For a security app, this provides basic information. If anything goes wrong after initial setup, good luck.

I have sent multiple emails (at least 4) in regards to a flaw with the "silent arming" feature in the app and have not received a response to any of my inquiries. I am very disappointed as it is not professional to not respond to the issues or questions of customers.
Very Very easy to use :)

Had to replace router, Wi-Fi camera won't connect. Have to sit thru 
20-30min of troubleshooting on the app just to get to the network 
configuration step in the troubleshooting process. Go thru all the steps 
and the camera STILL won't connect. That's absurd. Why not make it so you 
can easily change Wi-Fi connection info thru the app? Had to call customer 
support and spoke to Nick. Nick couldn't get thru to tech support and said 
he'd have them call me. Still waiting for that call back!

Changed routers and the doorbell refuses to reconnect. Wizard takes 15 
minutes just to say "oh, just do it in the app", but the app doesn't have 
that functionality. There are other features that you click on and they 
don't work.
Wish I could take a photo of a scene from video screen.

App logged me out by itself. When i logged back in, it's not working. 
Uninstalled and reinstalled but still not working
Had Guardian for almost 2 years now and I don't ever want to change .

We have been trying to get thru to customer support for 2 days, unable to. 
We keep getting the recording. You changed from guardian to Brinks without 
notice. We are having an issue with the alarm system and no one will help 
us. Now we must switch our service to another company.

Scott and Steve were very patient and excellent at explaining the duress 
code. Scott is very personable and kind-hearted with a professional 
attitude. Enjoyed speaking with both of these special customer reps! Now I 
will be with you for sure for 2 more years and longer I hope. I have 
recommended your service on the next door app to several people. Thank you 
for your service!
Love my camera and door bell
Great App it does everything I need and keeps my house as safe as possible
Great service
Love being able to check in from anywhere
Always reminds me to set alarm
Ok
Its a nice very clear even at night very nice camera system
App works wonderfully! Let's me do what I want just from my phone!!
It will not allow us to log in

This app makes it easy to arm and disarm system when my hands are full 
rather coming or going

Works great, however, adding the ability to select all camera footage for 
deletion rather than individuals clips would be extremely useful.
Keeps crashing I can't even arm or disarm my alarm thru here
It's very informative.  Helpful
Feel safe at home

This company suck big time! First I want to know when they are going to pay me for placing their Guardian sign in my front yard like that salesperson said!  ok here we go first the service first install it worked fine. the next several days no camera & no doorbell. I called in they wanted to send the rep out to fix it but they had a 4-Hour window like my time is not important or valuable. Men after 3 months they told me I would have to pay for a technician to come out and look at it and repair it I said I wasn't going to pay for it because it never work properly in the first place and here is my troubles begin want me to pay $140 for the technician to come out and install it correctly and when they did come on a different day, I told him I would not be paying for his labor.  he said that was fine. This guy did a great job he informed me that they never correctly install the system in the first place I need a WiFi enhancer in the doorbell wasn't properly install I spoke to a rep on the phone the same day we had his labor waive and the enhancer part waived until it was time to pay. I need to try to pull a fast one and try to take it directly out of my auto pay monthly billing account can't get any justice or respect as a customer suck right off the beginning. Had this service since June and here it is January 2018 because my camera off and I can't get it or go action. I never been satisfied and I will stop paying for this. I will fight this in court if necessary please do not get this app it sucks

This app is straight garbage no other way to say it, unfortunately I'm locked into a 5-year contract with these bums and soon as the buyout gets within reason I will be cancelling my contract and moving on to somewhere else that is more reliable, the fact that me and my wife have to tag team alarm when we leave in the morning for about 25 minutes to make sure that the away has taken in the system is just terrible and somewhat stressful at the same time, and after calling and complaining to guardian on numerous occasions the system has not gotten any better sometimes even gotten worse! but trust and believe if you call them to complain about their system or have them come out and fix their system that they put in they will charge you for each and every time they come out to your house to fix the problem that they not did not fix the first time they came there..Damn shame
The actual app could be a bit more advanced in today's age of technology but overall i have no major complaints.  System does what its supposed to do
Great and easy

I like that I can look in on my home BUT why isn't there an emergency button on the app. What happens if there is a break in while my alarm isn't on and I can't run to the panel? Im kinda screwed in that scenario.
It works when I want it to
love this app and service
In my house is bad people please help me and my family
I dont now if it works yet so ''_

Just told tech services that the control panel won't work, the app says Vivint instead of guardian when you open it, and none of the cameras show. If I could give this app and service *zero* stars I would. The BBB needs to hear about this and reduce their ratings down to an f.
The mobile arming and disarming feature  doesnt respond in a timely manner, and sometimes doesnt connect to the system.  The sensors dont always trigger as well
Until it stopped working this week, I loved this app, but now I can no longer arm or disarm remotely, I have to use the system panel in my shop
Love that I have access to my system from anywhere, don't love that I can't seem to remove old phone info therefore get constant malfunction notifications.
Awesome!
It works great
Great service and a very friendly company customer service !!
This app is excellent and works very well. Highly recommend!
Very user friendly. Intuitive.
This app freakin sucks

My first day and the doorbell rings. I picked up my phone and NOTHING! Then at 10 pm, the panel starts beeping like crazy for no reason at all. This is a brand new system. Installed 7 hrs ago. Why is the battery low? Why is it not installed already fully charged? I'm switching to ADT or someone else. The app on the phone or internet does not work. This is not a reliable system and tech support told me that I have to deal with the beeps in the middle of the night until the battery charges (if it charges) or turn the system off. What kind of sense does that make? Not a good system at all
Great!
Bad update with no accessible options for svr
As of today the app is not working to manage the system nor does the website. Neither will talk to the panel to Arm or Disarm.
Not bad.   Keep improving
Greatness
I really like the latest update. Application is user friendly. Note 5.

Too much of a delay between notification of doorbell push and the app opening the video feed...by the time it finally opens, the person has left the front door.  Would like an easy method of adding other features to the app such as smart door locks, thermostats, lights, etc...  May be able to accomplish this from the website but I primarily utilize my phone now.
Quick to respond never any problems

Waited over 2hrs past the appointment window and had to contact customer service he was not able to even reach the tech. He left without saying a word when he was done and garage device is still not functioning correctly.

My system was just installed. Guardian also installed the wiring and connective devices through my new home with Ryan Homes. The front door locks open and close by themselves. The garage door has no link to the app and was a huge selling point for me to purchase the system. Customer Service says I need to wait 3 weeks for a tech to come out.
The Gaurdian Protection
It's fast and easy to use.
Easy and intuitive to use to set alarms, unlock, view cam feeds and check on status. Definitely get the app to use when away from home!
I love this company. They are very professional and prompt
App works pretty good. It would be nice to be able to zoom in when looking at  cameras. I would love that!  Other companies have this feature.
Love the remote features.  I know this is not the only company capable of this technology. It works well for me
LOVE the Mobile app
Satisfied Customer
Love the app! Works great!
It's really a good app, but I really, really wish you could pinch and zoom on the video feeds.
I will definitely be calling this company again.
Love it and Guardian Protection Services

Sometimes it does work but more times it doesn't work on our phones. We didn't have any problems until we got new phones an now we can't lock or unlock our home at ALL with our phones? I can't even have our daughter come look in on things now because of it? The remotes work fine, but this app sucks!  please "fix it!"
I like the cameras outside my house when I'm gone and I can see what's happening all around, but I still have a problem with the camera inside I cannot view it on my phone
Please update. Thanks.
Awesome app , way better than total connect
Awesome
App works effortlessly with alarm. Arming and disarming is quick and easy. Watching a live feed from the camera(s) is a great feature. Overall user interface is excellent.
Cool app
I like the way it is.
Love the app. Very convenient.
So nice
I love monitoring my sytem when i am away
Nice app
100% accurate & dependable!
Very simple to use, but has all it is needed to monitor your system.
I like turtles.
Works seamlessly with alarm. Great way to automate your home or business reasonably

I have full control of my alarm  and plus home automation with my lights and thermostat.  Soon I will get locks. But the best is the cameras.  I can keep an eye of what's going on at home when I'm  gone.
